title: Dodging bullets!
author: verias
text:
Hidden Name: Mike

So! Just like waaaaaaaay back in chapter one, William demonstrates his ability to agilely dodge shots being made at him when they're expected.

And! Look, Melody is back! But it does look like she might be in a bit of trouble, doesn't it?

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Dodging bullets like he's in the matrix, niiice.

Mandrake had better move fast if she's gonna save Melody...
